explanation: [0-0] Pomni sits at a table holding a bottle of hot sauce in her right hand, her eyes wide with delight as she looks towards the table.

[0-6] The camera then pulls back to reveal Pomni sitting across from Jax at a table, each with a pizza in front of them. Pomni adds a generous amount of hot sauce to her pizza. Jax notices this and looks surprised. Pomni offers the hot sauce to Jax, who extends his left hand in a gesture of refusal. Jax smells the aroma of the pizza, tilts his head back, and reveals a satisfied expression. Pomni rests her chin on her hands, both appearing content with their pizzas.
